metadata.name: Suspicious PFX File Creation
metadata.comment: A general detection for processes creating PFX files. This could be an indicator of an adversary exporting a local certificate to a PFX file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.pfx')) AND NOT (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\templates\\windows\\windows_temporarykey.pfx')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\cmake\\'))))

output.summary: A general detection for processes creating PFX files. This could be an indicator of an adversary exporting a local certificate to a PFX file.

metadata.objective: False positive: System administrators managing certificates. References: https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29/issues/14, https://github.com/OTRF/ThreatHunter-Playbook/blob/2d4257f630f4c9770f78d0c1df059f891ffc3fec/docs/evals/apt29/detections/6.B.1_6392C9F1-D975-4F75-8A70-433DEDD7F622.md
